page.title: 08A DAYS WORK
page.content: Mrs Leaton gets up at 7.30am and has toast for breakfast. She does any jobs that need doing like walking the dog and collecting the bread. Then she reads. Reading is Mrs Leaton's favourite recreation. She also enjoys going to the Flower Club and the W.I. Then Mrs Leaton picks up her 2 children from school. They are hungry so Mrs Leaton gets the dinner. It is time for Mrs Leaton to take Clare to Brownies. Then she relaxes and watches the Antiques Road Show on television. Mrs Leaton wants to go on holiday so she has booked a holiday to go to West Bay. After a hard days work Mrs Leaton is very tired so she has a wash, cleans her teeth and goes to bed.
